metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2739 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MiniDLNA has heap-based buffer overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

minidlna - 1.1.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minidlna package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.2+dfsg-1').
